Plot: Nikhil is re-introduced to Meeta nearly ten years after their first meeting. Now, as Nikhil has one week to prove himself worth enough to marry Meeta's sister Karishma, the old acquaintances become quite close to each other.
Title: Hasee Toh Phasee
Writer: Harshavardhan Kulkarni (story and screenplay), Anurag Kashyap (dialogue), Harshavardhan Kulkarni (dialogue), Purva Naresh (dialogue), Vinil Matthew (dialogue)
Actors: Aariyan Gupta, Adah Sharma, Amita Udgata, Anshikaa Shrivastava
